title: Problem-Based Microlearning Course in Welding Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of metallic materials and foundational engineering principles
context.additional_context: PBL (Problem-Based Learning) application focused on solving industrial field problems in smartphone-based mobile learning environments

learning_goals: Analyze real-world welding defect cases from industrial settings and propose solutions
Determine optimal parameters (temperature, current, etc.) for welding processes using mobile learning modules
Write a welding quality assessment report after a team-based project and incorporate peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
